Package com.welie.blessed.bluez

Class BluezGattService

java.lang.Object
com.welie.blessed.bluez.AbstractBluetoothObject
com.welie.blessed.bluez.BluezGattService
public class BluezGattService
extends AbstractBluetoothObject
Wrapper class which represents a GATT service provided by a remote device.
